isis.stitle: TSI 95-12-16 - Revision to the Special Torque Values for the High Pressure Pump Mounting Bolts Found on the T 444E Diesel Engine and the High Pressure Pump Mounting Bolts, Injection Control Pressure Valve and Injection Control Pressure Valve Tinnermann Nut Found on the DT 466E and International® 530E Diesel Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Revision to the Special Torque Values for the High Pressure Pump Mounting Bolts Found on the T 444E Diesel Engine and the High Pressure Pump Mounting Bolts, Injection Control Pressure Valve and Injection Control Pressure Valve Tinnermann Nut Found on the DT 466E and International® 530E Diesel Engines

svcprocinfo.para: A correction needs to be made to the special torque value for the high pressure pump mounting bolts as follows:

svcsubproc.title: T 444E Service Manual, EGES 120
svcsubproc.para: High Pressure Pump Mounting Bolts - 47 Nm (35 lb-ft.)
High Pressure Pump Mounting Bolts - 27 Nm (20 lb-ft.)

svcsubproc.title: DT 466E and International® 530E Service Manual, EGES 160
svcsubproc.para: A correction needs to be made to the special torque values for the high pressure pump mounting bolts, injection control pressure valve and the injection control pressure valve tinnermann nut as follows:
High Pressure Pump Mounting Bolts - 47 Nm (35 lb-ft.)
High Pressure Pump Mounting Bolts - 27 Nm (20 lb-ft.)
Injection Control Pressure Valve - 35 Nm (26 lb-in.)
Injection Control Pressure Valve - 47 Nm (35 lb-ft.)
Injection Control Pressure Valve Tinnermann Nut - 6 Nm (5.5 lb-in.)
Injection Control Pressure Valve Tinnermann Nut - 6 Nm (55 lb-in.)
